org.hamcrest.junit.internal

Class StacktracePrintingMatcher<T extends java.lang.Throwable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<T>
      • org.hamcrest.TypeSafeMatcher<T>
        • org.hamcrest.junit.internal.StacktracePrintingMatcher<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.hamcrest.Matcher<T>, org.hamcrest.SelfDescribing

    public class StacktracePrintingMatcher<T extends java.lang.Throwable>
extends org.hamcrest.TypeSafeMatcher<T>
    A matcher that delegates to throwableMatcher and in addition appends the stacktrace of the actual Throwable in case of a mismatch.
